title: Desire - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Complex Family Relationships   Crime   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Lawyers   Love Triangles   Modern Day   Murders   Mysterious Family Background   Mystery Solving   Police   Politics
author: Li Jae Ik   이재익
description:
This is a story of crime, scandal, and romance.

A murder has shaken the Korean business world. The strong-willed prosecutor, Cha Jiyeon must now uncover the secrets of Eunseong Group.

Who is the hidden killer? Who will inherit the company? Furthermore, what is her connection to the mysterious Seo Minho?

She will soon discover she is more connected to the company than she realizes.>
